Title: Belladonna of Sadness
Writer: Yoshiyuki Fukuda, Jules Michelet (novel), Eiichi Yamamoto
Actors: Tatsuya Nakadai, Katsuyuki Itô, Aiko Nagayama, Shigako Shimegi
Plot: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.
